00067 inline void CInteractiveLineShape::EnsurePointsAreValid() const
00068 {
00069        if (!m_arePointsValid){
00070               const i2d::CLine2d* linePtr = dynamic_cast<const i2d::CLine2d*>(GetModelPtr());
00071               if (linePtr != NULL){
00072                      CalcPoints(*linePtr);
00073               }
00074               else{
00075                      ResetPoints();
00076               }
00077               m_arePointsValid = true;
00078        }
00079 }
00080 
00081 
00082 inline void CInteractiveLineShape::EnsurePointsAreValid(const i2d::CLine2d& line) const
00083 {
00084        if (!m_arePointsValid){
00085               CalcPoints(line);
00086               m_arePointsValid = true;
00087        }
00088 }
